title: Circus Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Let's play our newest free jigsaw game Circus Jigsaw Puzzle. In this game, you have 6 circus images with animals and clowns. Choose one of the modes for the game that you previously choose and start it playing. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Numbers crossed
description: This game is a combination of a crossword game and a mind puzzle. Instead of playing with words you will play with numbers. This game is really simple to understand and play this game and it is also super fun and addictive. You will face numerous challenges depending on your skills, so the game will adapt to your level.
instructions: this game is a mix of crosswords and a puzzle. Instead of playing with words, you will play with numbers.

title: Filling Lines
description: Filling Lines is a New HTML5 Puzzle Game. In this connection game, you should connect each shape to its similar, in order to fill the puzzle in the correct order. If you do not connect the shapes in the correct order, you will not win the level.
instructions: Click and drag the line to connect the tiles.

title: Magic Forest Tiles Puzzle
description: "Magic Forest : Tiles puzzle" is a popular and addictive pair matching puzzle game. Master the game by training your brain thinking and memory with tons of challenging well-designed levels . Find the matching tiles, connect the pairs with up to 3 lines. Remove all tile pairs before the time is over. Exercise your brain and become a tile matching master level by level. Enjoy the numerous, amazing, beautiful and various themes in the game.
instructions: - The goal is to remove all tiles by connecting pairs of matching tiles before the end of the timer. - Connect the same tiles in no more than 3 lines.

title: Tricky Puzzle
description: A bright, colorful puzzle game that will not let you get bored. Stunning graphics and animation will please your eyes. In-game music, sound, and voice over are created by a professional composer. All the puzzles in this game share one great storyline. The solution comes through out of the box thinking training your mind and brains at the same time! Save aliens, count bees, pet a dog and much more... Shake, tilt, rotate your mobile to solve puzzles.
instructions: Save aliens, count bees, stroke a dog, open doors and much more. Shake, twist, flip your phone to solve problems.

title: Hexfall Maniac
description: Match bricks and clear lines of tiles from the hexagonal board by sliding and rotating hexa blocks. Just relax and train your brain at the same time with this block matching game. Simply slide on screen to left or right with mouse and try to match 3 colors with same hexagon colors. The perfect go-to puzzle game for brain teasers and puzzle lovers!
instructions: Simply click to an hexagon to select it. Slide on the hexagon to left or right with mouse and try to match 3 colors with same hexagon colors. Your goal is to avoid the available moves from running out.

title: Crazy Monster Blocks
description: Welcome to our newest merge numbers game called Crazy Monster Blocks. You have to merge two blocks with the same numbers. The numbers are from 1 to 9. When you reach number 9, the whole row is released. The next suggested monster block number can be seen at the bottom of the screen. The game is played by tapping on the screen with a mouse or with a touch. Enjoy and have fun!!!
instructions: Use the mouse to play the game.

title: Crab & Fish
description: A simple and addictive physics puzzle. Free Fishes and compete with friends, the more friends, the more chances to win! Don't lose your opportunity to save the ocean!
instructions: Click on the blocks the Crab is standing on to remove them. Keep your balance! It's important to get to Fishes and free them all!

title: Hexa Stapler
description: Hexa Stapler is a fascinating and fun game waiting for your decision. The game is interesting, simple at first and more complicated as you progress through the levels. In this game you have to place the hexagonal cells in the appropriate place and set to compose the image.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Sokonumber
description: Sokonumber is a minimalistic and relaxing puzzle game. Place and keep all numbered tiles to their destination to clear the level and unlock the next challenge.
instructions: Keyboard (WASD, Arrows), Touch/Mouse (Swipe Up, Down, Left, Right )

title: Words Swipe
description: Word Swipe is a fun HTML5 Word Game provided by DoonDookStudio. This game has a beautiful design and will attract your audience. In this HTML5 word game, there are some blocks with a letter on them. You should swipe on the letters to make a meaningful word. When the word is complete, the letters will be destroyed. At each level, you should find all the words to pass. There is a hint for each word at the top of the screen. Also, you can use different help options to find the correct word.
instructions: Connect the letters to create a word

title: Tangram Match Masters
description: This Tangram is a new kind of tangram games, mix between a classic tangram and a classic puzzle. This game is super fun to play and easy to understant. As in any tangram you need to fill in the shape with blocks. The difficulty is that you canno't just drop a block, you need that thze borders of that block fit with the colors of the adjacents blocks. It's super simple isn't it ? But now will you master the challenge ?
instructions: you need to fill in the shape with blocks. The difficulty is that you canno't just drop a block, you need that thze borders of that block fit with the colors of the adjacents blocks.

title: Noob Vs Pro 4 Lucky Block
description: Welcome to Noob vs Pro 4! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to get and open Lucky Block Embark on an adventurous journey: Noob and Pro wants to open Lucky Block, but Hacker has stolen it. Ride a pig. Complete deadly trials with traps. Get to the bottom of the secret Mine. Find Lucky Block. Enjoy the jokes and stupid antics of Noob. Indulge yourself in some adventures and become the hero of a brand new story. Open hellish Lucky Block for free!
instructions: To move, just press the buttons on the screen! When playing from the computer, you can press the "Space bar" to move forward

title: Liquid puzzle sort the color
description: Liquid Puzzle is a fun and addictive puzzle game. Sort the colored water in the glasses to keep only one color per glass. Liquid Puzzle, is a very simple game to play (you can play with only one finger) but also super fun to play. You have numerous unique levels to resolve and enjoy hours of pure pleasure.
instructions: Tap any glass to collect the top colored water, and then tap any other glass to pour the liquid. Your goal is to fill each glass with only 1 color

title: Grass Cutter
description: Grass Cutter is a satisfying relaxing puzzle. Enjoy multiple levels decorated with beautiful flowers. • Simple swipe-to-move controls • Relaxed gameplay • Stress relieving action
instructions: Swipe to move the blade

title: Toys Math
description: This is a math puzzle game where you buy a set of toys in each level. Each toy has a different price tag. For buying, connect some numbers which sum up equal to the price of the toy. Buy all 8 toys within allowed time to complete a level. Complete all 12 levels to win this game.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Puzzlez
description: The best and most addictive logic puzzle game with minimalism graphics and unique level design! A game for your brain. Most addictive game. Features --Tons of manually designed levels --Easy but Funny gameplay --Minimalism graphics
instructions: Collection of Puzzle games. Each game has its instructions before play.

title: Jumping Together
description: The pups just want to go home. To do so they will have to reach the exit on each level. The pups can't jump very high on their own but jumping together they can reach new heights. 24 challenging levels that will get you thinking.
instructions: Use the arrow or WAD keys or arrow keys to move and jump or for touch devices use the onscreen buttons.

title: Fruit Sort Puzzle
description: Fruit Sort Puzzle is a casual game that is extremely easy to pick up and is also a free online matching game. The game incorporates hawthorn and fruit, with various fruits of the same color falling on top of the fork to form a hawthorn, if the fork doesn't fit the game is over, try to see how many hawthorns you can get.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Pop Rush
description: Guess the percentages of world trivia! Pop Rush is a multiplayer trivia runner game. Players have to collect balloons and avoid thorns and give answer to questions they encountered. Enjoy unique trivia game and pop enemies' balloons!
instructions: Use mouse to control character.

title: Tile Matching
description: Challenge yourself with this fun and simple mahjong-inspired game, your goal is to match 3 tiles and clear all tiles. If you like playing Match 3 puzzles or mahjong, you will love to play Tile Matching.
instructions: Tap or click available tile to move it into placement

title: EXIT unblock red wood block
description: EXIT is a fun puzzle game, quick and easy to play, and also challenging for everyone. Just move the blocks, try to move out the red wooden block making it go through the exit path. Can you move out the red block? The wood graphics of the game make you feel like it is a very classic puzzle game. Enjoy hours of gameplay with over 300 levels to unblock.
instructions: Just move the blocks, try to move out the red wooden block making it go through the exit path

title: Hex bomb Megablast
description: HEX BOMB - MEGABLAST is a game in between a BUBBLE SHOOTER and a BRICKS BREAKER. Hexagonals blocks are falling from the top of the screen and you need to shoot at them and blast them before they reach the bottom of the screen. When you press the screen, the ball shooter will slow down to let you adjust your fire. When you release your finger, it fires automatically. Try to collect as many bonus and upgrades as you can to master the game like a pro and advance in the game.
instructions: Hexagonals blocks are falling from the top of the screen and you need to shoot at them and blast them before they reach the bottom of the screen.

title: Hidden Candies
description: Hidden Candies is an skill based hidden object game where you need to tap all the hidden candies in a level. You need to complete 16 challenging levels to win this game.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to find hidden objects.

title: 2048 Wooden Edition
description: The principle of this game is super simple and fun. Slide the tiles up, right, left or down to bump into each other. Tiles with the same numbers will merge and addition their amount to form a new number... 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024 and finally 2048... 2048 WOODEN EDITION has HD graphics that makes a complete original game and fun to play.
instructions: Swipe in the direction in which you wish the squares to move. Any doubles that collide will fuse (so two 8s will fuse to create a 16). When there is no more free space, the game is over. If you reach 2048, you win!

title: Stack Maze Puzzle
description: Stack Maze Puzzle is a very interesting leisure game for free. Players need to choose the appropriate route in the game and collect as many boards as possible to reach the end by sliding. The game is rich in content, with wonderful game modes, numerous game levels, and various maze types, so that you can enjoy the fun of maze games!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Pop Words
description: Type correct word and pop balloons. Try to reach base before your opponents and avoid from sharp obstacle. Challenge with other players all over the world and reach to toe bottom before them!
instructions: Use mouse to click letter buttons to make words.

title: Farm Pic Tetriz
description: This is a simple yet interesting picture tetriz game. In this game you need to drop the picture pieces to its exact position to form the complete picture. Press the piece, take it to the right place and drop. Complete 8 exciting level to win the game.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Puzzle Math
description: Puzzle Math is a fun game where you exercise your knowledge of mathematics and still have fun revealing various puzzles according to the right answers. Education and fun in one place.
instructions: On the computer: use the mouse On Mobile: use touch

title: Wordscapes
description: Wordscapes is a challenging HTML5 Word Game available to purchase. This word game sharpens your mind and is so addictive. In each level of this word game, you should connect the letters to make as many hidden words as you can. Challenge yourself to connect letters correctly! When you pass a level, you will collect coins and you can use them as hints later.
instructions: Connect the letters to create a word.

title: Jigsaw Puzzle Cats & Kitten
description: "Jigsaw Puzzle Cats & Kitten " is a classic jigsaw puzzle game but specifically designed for digital screens. You can drag and drop pieces like in a real jigsaw puzzle board game. This jigsaw puzzle game is dedicated to cats and kitten. You have the choise to play from easy puzzles from a couple of piece to very hard puzzles with hundred of pieces.You can also play with the daily challenge to unlock special items.
instructions: put the pieces of the puzzle together

title: Hexoboy. Blue world
description: Meet Hexoboy, a new cool free-to-play platformer game with plenty of adventures, puzzles, and fun. Use your skills and wits to help the cute brave hero in his adventure in the hexagonal game based on classic puzzle platformers.
instructions: use arrows or wasd to move and space for jump

title: Recycling Time 2
description: “Recycling Time 2” is the second game in the recycling franchise, where the player must clean nature by collecting trash and putting it in their respective trash cans, for recycling to be done correctly, thus helping the planet.
instructions: On Computer: Use mouse to play. On Mobile: Use touch to play

title: Puzzle Parking 3D
description: Puzzle Parking 3D is a fun puzzle parking game online and a free simulation game for kids in which you have to act as a driver and use your brain to park the car into the parking space, come and challenge yourself and you will be the next parking master. The time has come to prove that you are a competent driver.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: 9x9 Rotate and Flip
description: This is a 9x9 grid block game. You must fit the pieces to make horizontal or vertical matches. There are three game modes: 'Classic': Make as many rows and columns as possible to score. You will lose the game if you don't have more spaces to fit the pieces; 'By time': You lose when your time's up. But you can gain extra time by destroying rows or columns that have the power-up Time.; and Bombs: Destroy rows or columns with bombs to defuse them. If any bomb explode you lose!
instructions: Touch in the pieces and drag to the grid to fit them.

title: SortPuz Water Sort Color Sorting Game
description: Try to sort the watercolors into the glass tubes so that one glass only holds one type of color. Pour colored water from one tube to another tube to complete the level. This colorful game seems easy yet challenging as well. The higher level you reach, the harder it gets since there are more tubes to arrange colors.
instructions: Try to sort the watercolors into the glass tubes so that one glass only holds one type of color. Pour colored water from one tube to another tube to complete the level. This colorful game seems easy yet challenging as well. The higher level you reach, the harder it gets since there are more tubes to arrange colors.

title: Pet Match
description: Pet Match is match 3 game with fresh character funny and cute, you can play on endless mode with time and beat your own score and see how many score you can achieve or play as level, it has more than 100+ level.
instructions: Match all the cuttiest animal

title: Rope Bowing Puzzle
description: Rope Bowing Puzzle is an interesting and addictive puzzle game. It looks easy enough, but you also have to concentration and dodge some obstacles that will make it difficult for you.
instructions: You will be challenged to cut the rope and let the ball hit the object. After the ball hit all object you can continue to the next level.

title: Spring Differences
description: This is a Spot the difference type of puzzle game where players must find differences between two otherwise similar images. Try to find differences using your hawk eyes and tap that otherwise use hint. Saved time will give you extra bonus score.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Get 11 - Puzzle
description: Get 11 is an addictive block and number puzzle game that is great for brain training! Welcome to an incredibly addictive puzzle game with an original plot of events! Get 11 is a simple logical but difficult puzzle game to complete. There are no time limits or tasks in the game. The graphics of the game are suitable for all ages, that game will be interesting to play for both children and adults! Train, play and have fun!
instructions: It's very easy to start playing! • Click on blocks with numbers. • Merge blocks with the same numbers. • Combine them all to reach the goal!

title: Kill The Dragon - Bridge Block Puzzle
description: This is a Puzzle game you have never played before. You have to remove the blocks and build a perfect bridge for the Knight to move to the other side. Knight will kill the dragon and collect the golden coin. You have 50 Levels to complete. You will have a good experience. Why are you waiting... Play and Enjoy!
instructions: Tap on the blocks/Bricks to remove the blocks/bricks and build a perfect bridge for the Knight to move to the other side to kill the dragon.

title: Magic Herobrine - smart brain & puzzle quest
description: Welcome to Magic Herobrine - smart brain & puzzle quest! Take a deep breath and dive into an magic cube world of puzzle quests fun with Herobrine and lucky blocks, an all-new free game! Try challenging and fun smart brain quest gameplay with unique puzzles as you pass logic levels to become more smart. Burn boxes, open lucky blocks, get chests, and solve cool puzzles and quests. Hey, your herobrine is waiting for you, so enjoy this amazing Magic Herobrine - smart brain & puzzle quest adventure!
instructions: Tap\click on crates to burn it and get lucky block!

title: Breacking Blocks
description: Breacking Blocks is a fun match-three game. In most match-three games you are flipping a series of jewels or gems in a grid and trying to line them all up in order to make them disappear. But Breacking Blocks is a different kind of game, you'll be tasked with the responsibility of lining up three blocks of a certain color in a row in order to make them disappear. Instead of flipping jewels, you will be positioning a series of falling blocks.
instructions: Touch and drag to move. Click and drag to move.

title: Cat Safari 2
description: Create cute cats in the colorful animal app Cat Safari. Mysterious crates seem to appear regularly on a large abandoned field – and inside, each one holds an adorable kitten! Combining two of the same kind of cat yields something completely new – step by step, you'll be able to breed unique new breeds of cats. Experience the unique cat game and initiate a cat evolution of your very own! Feline fanatics aren't the only ones who'll be scrambling to get more and more cats.
instructions: • diverse breeds of cats that can be combined into new felines • adorable animations and lovingly detailed graphics • constant evolution • spectacular opportunities to fuse cats from regular mixes over purebreds to big cats • virtual customers seeking specific breeds • sale of cats for in-game currency which you can use to customize your meadows

title: Birthday Girl Jigsaw
description: Welcome to our newest Birthday Girl Jigsaw game. In this game, you have 6 images. Choose one of the modes for the game that you previously choose and start it playing. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Survival Squidly Game
description: Survival Squid Game is about earning a final reward of 45.6 billion, by surviving six rounds of survival games, including Red Light, Green Light, Dalgona Candy, Tug of War, Marble Game, and Glass Bridge. Can you be the choosen one?
instructions: Follow ingame instructions.

title: Hexologic
description: Immerse yourself in the beautiful world of Hexologic. Solve challenging, yet rewarding puzzles, listen to relaxing music and dive deep in the game’s atmosphere! Hexologic is very easy to learn and in the same time a highly addictive language-independent logic puzzle game. A simple gameplay mechanics adorned with a beautiful graphic design, relaxing music and challenging yet not unbeatable puzzles, will guarantee long hours of fun for gamers of all ages.
instructions: Combine the dots inside the hexes in three possible directions, so that their sum matches the one given at the edge!

title: Wood Block Puzzle
description: The all-time classic Wood Block Puzzle with all the features that a great block puzzle has to offer. The more wood blocks you crush, the more score you get. It’s easy to start but it takes smart thinking and strategy to become a master! How many points can you score?
instructions: Place different wood blocks on the game board to fill horizontal or vertical lines to make them disappear. If there is no more room to place the wood blocks, then the game is over! Use clever strategy and smart thinking and anticipate your next move in order not to waste precious space on the game board. If you do you run into problems, you can choose to invest some of your coins in mighty boosters which for instance clear an area of your choice.

title: Tile Master Puzzle
description: Tile Master - Classic Triple Match & Puzzle Game：Relaxing and enjoyable zen game. It is a free simple and exciting puzzle game. The game is suitable for entertainment, intense study and relaxation after working hours.
instructions: Tap any block to drag and drop it onto the board. Three identical blocks will be removed from the board. Clear all blocks as soon as possible. When all blocks are cleared, you have completed the level! When there are 7 blocks on the board, you lose!

title: Kittygram
description: The traditional logic game “Tangram” meets the cute kitties of Kitty Blocks, forming the most adorable brain teaser out there! There are 8 degrees of difficulty with 72 levels each, for a total of 576 games!
instructions: Drag and drop pieces into the board
